gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render

Class EllipseVectorRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.usgs.volcanoes.core.legacy.plot.render.EllipseVectorRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Renderer

    public class EllipseVectorRenderer
extends Object
implements Renderer

    This is a Renderer that draws vectors with error ellipses. Access the public member variables directly to set renderer specifications.

    Author:
    Dan Cervelli
